GreenScreenLabel_For_best_results_take_a: For best results, take a moment to adjust your settings before starting your photo session. If you do not adjust your settings, dslrBooth's default settings will be applied.
GreenScreenLabel_Have_someone_stand_in_f: Have someone stand in front of the green screen while you adjust your settings
GreenScreenLabel_How_will_the_background: How will the background image be selected during the photo session?
GreenScreenLabel_Using_flash_take_a_test: Using flash, take a test photo of someone in front of green screen:
GreenScreenTooltip_Cycles_through_backgr: Cycles through backgrounds for each photo
GreenScreenTooltip_Asks_user_to_select_a: Asks user to select a background to use
GreenScreenAddBackgroundImageLabel_This_: This image will replace the green screen
This image will appear on top of your photo subject
GreenScreenAddBackgroundImageLabel_Note_: Note: overlay images must be saved as a transparent .png file.
GreenScreenLabel_For_best_results_adjust: For best results, adjust your settings while someone stands in front of the green screen.
GreenScreenLabel_For_best_results_have_g: For best results, have guests stand in front of a plain backdrop.
GreenScreenLabel_Video_sessions_are_not_: Video sessions are not supported with AI background removal.
GreenScreenLabel_Up_to_four_people_next_: Up to four people next to each other.
GreenScreenLabel_Keep_people_close_to_th: Keep people close to the camera and far from background.
GreenScreenLabel_Person_height_is_at_lea: Person height is at least half of image height.
